scenario_text.value: (Oh, it’s Ryo...)
(Alone in the classroom again?)
(Ah, whoops. I guess he’s not alone...)

Man, everyone here’s out of their freaking
minds...
...That includes you, Kunemon.
Shit... Say something already, why don’t ya!
Um...
YOW!!!

The heck... S-since when you been spying
on me, Takuma?!
Who was spying?!
Um...you know Kunemon can’t talk, right?
...The heck?!

Man, this freaking place... I keep getting
stuck with the short end of the stick...
Kunemon’s not the short end of the stick!

...You’ve got a mouth on you, Takuma.
You too, lizard breath.
I didn’t mean...
I’m not a lizard! I’m Agumon!
Shut up, already...

I don’t know what the heck anyone’s saying
anymore...
All of you are freaking nuts...
Um...

That includes you! Are you messed in the head
like Minoru? Or just an escapist like Aoi?

Well I... have to agree that Minoru’s got
a screw or two loose.
Right?! Something’s not right with that kid!

As for Aoi... She still seems to think
someone’s gonna come and rescue us.
...I can’t say I share her optimism.

Wait, seriously? It almost sounds like you’re
picking up what I’m putting down...

(Ryo’s a realist. That must make everything
we’ve seen that much harder to swallow.)

(...Can’t say I like the guy, but he makes
some decent points.)
...The heck’s gonna happen to us?
(Hmm, how should I respond...?)
Might be hopeless...
Let’s stay positive.
Guess we’ll see!

Might be hopeless, you know? Pretty words
aren’t going to change that...

...I thought so.
Yeah...I figured all along.

Shit...SHIT!
We’re all totally—!
Hey, we’re all still alive and kicking!

I’m not exactly optimistic, but it’s too
early to throw in the towel.

Some unknown cause brought us here, so some
unknown cause could send us right back.
...Heh, well that’s true.

We can give up, we can freak out, we can cry
or scream...

None of it makes a bit of difference.
Whatever happens, happens...

(Uh... I guess he’s satisfied? Although he
still sounds a bit testy to me...)

It’s up to us to decide that. We’ve gotta
stay positive.

If we work hard enough to pull it off,
that’ll be an answer in itself.
...Are you touched in the head, man?

I’m “positive” your way of thinking will land
us dead in a ditch somewhere!

Do our best? Work real hard? Then we’ll end
up back in our normal lives, that it?
...Okay, well when you put it that way—

Idiots just say whatever comes to mind, don’t
they? Ridiculous...

This place we’re in...
This could be the end of the line, y’know?
(Dude says some nasty things...)
(But, well...I kind of get it.)

This might not be much of an answer, but...
I guess we’ll see.
Whatever will be, will be, as they say...

First off, we don’t even know what’s going on
right in front of us.

You’re right, that ain’t much by way of an
answer! Still, you’ve got a point...

Guess I’m the idiot for asking in the first
place... Eesh...

*sigh*... I wish this bug thing could at
least say something.
Kunemon’s not a bug thing!
Shut your freaking trap, iguana face!
MY FACE IS NOT AN IGUANA!!!
Come on, leave him alone, Agumon.
Well, uh...later.
